name: Interference (itch) (Travanator)
description:
Submission to GMTK Game Jam 2021

Theme: Joined Together

The boss has created an energy field which saps health for power. The less health he has, the more power he has. And same with you, so your stats are joined together.

MANY KNOWN ISSUES

Unfortunately did not have time to fix most things, will not be updating it but definitely taking what I learned moving forward.

Just, pretend there's footstep sounds...

CONTROLS

Move- WASD / left stick

Look - Mouse / right stick

Shoot - Left Mouse button / Right Trigger

Jump - Space bar / A button (Xbox controller)

Sprint - Left Shift /Left Thumbstick in
